message: Let's divide fairly, I get a bit more
I think we should divide a bit more evenly. This offer is better for me in the long run.
I'll give you a bit less, but still more than last time I offered
I'm aiming for a fair deal. This offer considers the time pressure and the effect of inflation on both our shares.
Considering inflation, this is a good deal for you, think about the next rounds
Let's end this.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.  The value of the money is decreasing rapidly.
